issue.title: Parse SDF frame elements and attributes

content.raw:
Hi there,
did you implement the relative linking in Gazebo already?
I am running version 8.0 and it appears to me there is no support for this yet as the console states:
XML Attribute[frame] in element[link] not defined in SDF, ignoring.
Or am I missing something else?
Greetings
content.html: Hi there, did you implement the relative linking in Gazebo already? I am running version 8.0 and it appears to me there is no support for this yet as the console states: XML Attribute[frame] in element[link] not defined in SDF, ignoring. Or am I missing something else? Greetings
